about.details:
Docmode Health Technologies Limited was founded in 2017 and provides integrated learning solutions for healthcare professionals and learners worldwide through online and offline learning models.

The company's offline learning modules include conferences and workshops, while the online modules include courses developed by the company's content development team or by medical institutions and medical associations (medical professional organizations) and experts/opinion leaders.

The company also provides a platform for interprofessional, cross-sector learning through panel discussions and courses, and users can utilize its performance assessment tools to improve their clinical acumen in daily medical practice.

The company offers a total of 87 certificate programs and is affiliated with over 35 medical associations and universities around the world. The list of services includes:

  • DocMode LERN
  • DocMode SURE
  • DocMode KNOW
  • DocMode CARE
  • DocMode SHOP (previously called STORE)

As at December 31, 2023, the company had a total of 66 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Docmode Health Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Docmode Health Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 849600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹79 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 25, 2024, and closes on January 30, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Docmode Health Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Docmode Health Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Docmode Health Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Docmode Health Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Docmode Health Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Docmode Health Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Docmode Health Technologies IPO opens on January 25, 2024 and closes on January 30, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Docmode Health Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Docmode Health Technologies IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Docmode Health Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Docmode Health Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Docmode Health Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Docmode Health Technologies IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 31, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 1, 2024. Check the Docmode Health Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Docmode Health Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Docmode Health Technologies IPO listing date is on Friday, February 2, 2024.
